00049 typedef struct opj_tcd_seg {
00050         OPJ_BYTE ** data;
00051         OPJ_UINT32 dataindex;
00052         OPJ_UINT32 numpasses;
00053         OPJ_UINT32 real_num_passes;
00054         OPJ_UINT32 len;
00055         OPJ_UINT32 maxpasses;
00056         OPJ_UINT32 numnewpasses;
00057         OPJ_UINT32 newlen;
00058 } opj_tcd_seg_t;
00059 
00063 typedef struct opj_tcd_pass {
00064         OPJ_UINT32 rate;
00065         OPJ_FLOAT64 distortiondec;
00066         OPJ_UINT32 len;
00067         OPJ_UINT32 term : 1;
00068 } opj_tcd_pass_t;
00069 
00073 typedef struct opj_tcd_layer {
00074         OPJ_UINT32 numpasses;           /* Number of passes in the layer */
00075         OPJ_UINT32 len;                         /* len of information */
00076         OPJ_FLOAT64 disto;                      /* add for index (Cfr. Marcela) */
00077         OPJ_BYTE *data;                         /* data */
00078 } opj_tcd_layer_t;
00079 
00083 typedef struct opj_tcd_cblk_enc {
00084         OPJ_BYTE* data;                                 /* Data */
00085         opj_tcd_layer_t* layers;                /* layer information */
00086         opj_tcd_pass_t* passes;         /* information about the passes */
00087         OPJ_INT32 x0, y0, x1, y1;               /* dimension of the code-blocks : left upper corner (x0, y0) right low corner (x1,y1) */
00088         OPJ_UINT32 numbps;
00089         OPJ_UINT32 numlenbits;
00090         OPJ_UINT32 numpasses;                   /* number of pass already done for the code-blocks */
00091         OPJ_UINT32 numpassesinlayers;   /* number of passes in the layer */
00092         OPJ_UINT32 totalpasses;                 /* total number of passes */
00093 } opj_tcd_cblk_enc_t;
00094 
00095 
00096 typedef struct opj_tcd_cblk_dec {
00097         OPJ_BYTE * data;                                /* Data */
00098         opj_tcd_seg_t* segs;                    /* segments information */
00099         OPJ_INT32 x0, y0, x1, y1;               /* position of the code-blocks : left upper corner (x0, y0) right low corner (x1,y1) */
00100         OPJ_UINT32 numbps;
00101         OPJ_UINT32 numlenbits;
00102     OPJ_UINT32 data_max_size;           /* Size of allocated data buffer */
00103         OPJ_UINT32 data_current_size;   /* Size of used data buffer */
00104         OPJ_UINT32 numnewpasses;                /* number of pass added to the code-blocks */
00105         OPJ_UINT32 numsegs;                             /* number of segments */
00106         OPJ_UINT32 real_num_segs;
00107         OPJ_UINT32 m_current_max_segs;
00108 } opj_tcd_cblk_dec_t;
00109 
00113 typedef struct opj_tcd_precinct {
00114         OPJ_INT32 x0, y0, x1, y1;               /* dimension of the precinct : left upper corner (x0, y0) right low corner (x1,y1) */
00115         OPJ_UINT32 cw, ch;                              /* number of precinct in width and height */
00116         union{                                                  /* code-blocks information */
00117                 opj_tcd_cblk_enc_t* enc;
00118                 opj_tcd_cblk_dec_t* dec;
00119         } cblks;
00120         OPJ_UINT32 block_size;                  /* size taken by cblks (in bytes) */
00121         opj_tgt_tree_t *incltree;           /* inclusion tree */
00122         opj_tgt_tree_t *imsbtree;           /* IMSB tree */
00123 } opj_tcd_precinct_t;
00124 
00128 typedef struct opj_tcd_band {
00129         OPJ_INT32 x0, y0, x1, y1;               /* dimension of the subband : left upper corner (x0, y0) right low corner (x1,y1) */
00130         OPJ_UINT32 bandno;
00131         opj_tcd_precinct_t *precincts;  /* precinct information */
00132         OPJ_UINT32 precincts_data_size; /* size of data taken by precincts */
00133         OPJ_INT32 numbps;
00134         OPJ_FLOAT32 stepsize;
00135 } opj_tcd_band_t;
00136 
00140 typedef struct opj_tcd_resolution {
00141         OPJ_INT32 x0, y0, x1, y1;               /* dimension of the resolution level : left upper corner (x0, y0) right low corner (x1,y1) */
00142         OPJ_UINT32 pw, ph;
00143         OPJ_UINT32 numbands;                    /* number sub-band for the resolution level */
00144         opj_tcd_band_t bands[3];                /* subband information */
00145 } opj_tcd_resolution_t;
00146 
00150 typedef struct opj_tcd_tilecomp
00151 {
00152         OPJ_INT32 x0, y0, x1, y1;                               /* dimension of component : left upper corner (x0, y0) right low corner (x1,y1) */
00153         OPJ_UINT32 numresolutions;                              /* number of resolutions level */
00154         OPJ_UINT32 minimum_num_resolutions;             /* number of resolutions level to decode (at max)*/
00155         opj_tcd_resolution_t *resolutions;      /* resolutions information */
00156         OPJ_UINT32 resolutions_size;                    /* size of data for resolutions (in bytes) */
00157         OPJ_INT32 *data;                                                /* data of the component */
00158         OPJ_UINT32 data_size;                                   /* size of the data of the component */
00159         OPJ_INT32 numpix;                                               /* add fixed_quality */
00160 } opj_tcd_tilecomp_t;
00161 
00162 
00166 typedef struct opj_tcd_tile {
00167         OPJ_INT32 x0, y0, x1, y1;               /* dimension of the tile : left upper corner (x0, y0) right low corner (x1,y1) */
00168         OPJ_UINT32 numcomps;                    /* number of components in tile */
00169         opj_tcd_tilecomp_t *comps;      /* Components information */
00170         OPJ_INT32 numpix;                               /* add fixed_quality */
00171         OPJ_FLOAT64 distotile;                  /* add fixed_quality */
00172         OPJ_FLOAT64 distolayer[100];    /* add fixed_quality */
00173         OPJ_UINT32 packno;              /* packet number */
00174 } opj_tcd_tile_t;
00175 
00179 typedef struct opj_tcd_image
00180 {
00181         opj_tcd_tile_t *tiles;          /* Tiles information */
00182 }
00183 opj_tcd_image_t;

00189 typedef struct opj_tcd
00190 {
00192         OPJ_INT32 tp_pos;
00194         OPJ_UINT32 tp_num;
00196         OPJ_UINT32 cur_tp_num;
00198         OPJ_UINT32 cur_totnum_tp;
00200         OPJ_UINT32 cur_pino;
00202         opj_tcd_image_t *tcd_image;
00204         opj_image_t *image;
00206         opj_cp_t *cp;
00208         opj_tcp_t *tcp;
00210         OPJ_UINT32 tcd_tileno;
00212         OPJ_UINT32 m_is_decoder : 1;
00213 } opj_tcd_t;
